body_html:
It is difficult for me to reproduce the results in the tutorial. With all default parameters, my outputs are all _UNK, even at the 335800 steps.

My perplexity has gone down to 2.15. However, the results are not good.

global step 335800 learning rate 0.3056 step-time 1.04 perplexity 2.15
eval: bucket 0 perplexity 2.08
eval: bucket 1 perplexity 1.87
eval: bucket 2 perplexity 2.28
eval: bucket 3 perplexity 2.73

body:
It is difficult for me to reproduce the results in the tutorial. With all default parameters, my outputs are all _UNK, even at the 335800 steps.

![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/22711053/20027603/8aeb77f2-a2ee-11e6-8009-64951300c8b1.png)

My perplexity has gone down to 2.15. However, the results are not good.

> global step 335800 learning rate 0.3056 step-time 1.04 perplexity 2.15
>   eval: bucket 0 perplexity 2.08
>   eval: bucket 1 perplexity 1.87
>   eval: bucket 2 perplexity 2.28
>   eval: bucket 3 perplexity 2.73
